name: Rocky RoadTrip 6-11-2019 Version
description: Lester Rabbit, an old creation of mine, is finally brought to life in his very first video game (and maybe his last).  With the aid of his wise and wise-cracking narrator, Lester wallows thorugh his lackluster debut to realize he needs to be more open about his emotions in order for people to know how he feels. Otherwise, there's no way he can make it to the Frozen Yogurt Exhibit!
